Merging revision 634037 into 10.3 codeline fore DERBY-3458. The commit comments for 634037 were as follows
Patch submitted by Stephan van Loendersloot. dblook should set the current schema to be a system schema so that collation of system schema (UCS_BASIC) gets used when dealing with queries using system table columns and character constants. Stephan has also provided comprehensive test for the dblook code change.
